parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The region where the private gateway resides.

parameters.name: GatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the private gateway. To obtain the private gateway ID, see [ListGateway](~~2841911~~).

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the associated VPC. To obtain the VPC ID, see [ListGatewayIntranetLinkedVpc](~~2621223~~).

*   If you specify a VPC ID, only VPC peers corresponding to the ID are queried.
*   Otherwise, all VPC peers are queried.
